alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:46PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Madison and central Beaverhead Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 545 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles southwest of Divide to 6 miles southwest of Dillon. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. A brief heavy rain shower may also cause minor debris flow in the mountains due to rapid runoff. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Beaverhead Rock State Park and Glen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Northwest Beaverhead County
